SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.entities

Class ConfigurationEntity

java.lang.Object
pt.uc.dei.entities.ConfigurationEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Entity public class ConfigurationEntity extends Object implements Serializable
Entity representing system configuration settings. Stores various time limits and administrative details.
See Also:

  • Field Details

    • id

      private Long id
      The unique identifier for the configuration entry. Generated automatically.

    • loginTime

      private Integer loginTime
      The allowed login time duration (in minutes). Must always be set and can be updated.

    • verificationTime

      private Integer verificationTime
      The allowed verification time duration (in minutes). Must always be set and can be updated.

    • passwordResetTime

      private Integer passwordResetTime
      The allowed password reset time duration (in minutes). Must always be set and can be updated.

    • creationDate

      private LocalDateTime creationDate
      The date and time when this configuration was created. Cannot be updated once set.

    • twoFactorAuthEnabled

      private Boolean twoFactorAuthEnabled

    • admin

      private UserEntity admin
      The administrator responsible for setting this configuration. Many-to-one relationship with `UserEntity`.
